idea:
Shalin Composites India Pvt Ltd. is in 3 rd year of operations starting from may 2017. we are in to FRP pressure vessels manufacturing using CNC filament winding machine which is one of a kind plant in whole maharashtra. offering Customized FRP pressure vessel is our USP.

we mainly cater to domestic and international OEMs who are in to water treatment and Desalination business.

name: SHALIN COMPOSITES (INDIA) PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
OUR BACKGROUND :
QPRAS MARINE SERVICES LLP (QMS) was formed keeping in view that all it’s clients can get Survey related services i.e- Inspection & Testing, Fumigation and other related services under one roof. With our registered office at Mumbai and network offices at all major ports & cities in India, we are committed to render prompt and personalized services to all our clients
OUR VISION
To create an international bench mark in inspections, valuations, survey and loss adjustments
OUR MISSION
To commit PROFESSIONALISM with QUALITY and TRANSPARENCY.
CORE VALUES
• Professionalism
• Integrity
• Accountability
• Service Excellence
OUR SERVICES :
We offer Inspection, Supervision, Sampling, Testing, Plant Monitoring services as required for:
 Minerals, Ores & Concentrates (Iron Ore, Lumps & Pellets, Manganese Ore, Chrome
           Ores, etc.)
 Energy Minerals (Coal, Coke, Met Coke, etc.)
 Industrial Minerals (Bentonite, Gypsum, Salt, Soda Ash, Talc, Zeolite, etc)
 Raw materials for Cement, Steel & Fertilizer Industries
 Raw and finished Fertilizers
 Building Stones (Granite, Limestone, Marble, Sandstone, Slate, etc.)
 Steel & Scrap Metal
 Chemicals
 Food grains ,Animal feed and other agricultural products
Our regular scopes include:
 Supervision at mine heads and delivery ends.
 Onsite quality control laboratories for production and processing.
 Load port / Disport Quality & Quantity Inspection & Supervision
 Quantity (Weight & Numbers) determination, verification and assessments such as  Draught Survey (Initial, Intermediate & Final), Tally. 
 Warehouse supervision
 Stuffing & Loading Supervision.
 Inspection of cleanliness and load worthiness of vessel hatch/hold containers, as   applicable. 
 Verification of packaging type and condition, checking marking & labeling, damage to units, method of stowage, etc. Visual survey for units at point of loading to  match purchase order specifications. 
 Supervision for standardization / bagging / packing - Loss prevention of bulk / bagged material during handling, transit and transportation leading to substantial financial benefits. 
 Sampling and sample preparation across various stages of transport and storage.
 Laboratory Testing, Analysis and Certification for various quality parameters.
 Stock verification for periodic inventory checks out turn reports.
 Plant monitoring and process control.
 Provision of Photographic Evidence across various stages as required.
Our People
QMS people are well qualified (sector specific), trained, highly experienced, motivated and entirely dedicated. Apart from job related proficiency "Professional Conduct" and "Customer Satisfaction" are pre-requisite to QMS people. Personal capabilities are continually enhanced to suite changing market needs.
Each employee is responsible for the quality of work and improves the same continually, leading to greater customer satisfaction and improvement in the organization's capabilities and performance. We are committed to provide adequate and effective resources and manage them efficiently to ensure continual improvement of quality management system and customer satisfaction. We train our people in the principles and methods of quality improvement and operational / generic skills to enable them to identify and eliminate problems thereby improving our service quality and value our customer's interest.
Metals, Minerals, Ores & Chemicals
OUR NETWORK

ANDHRA PRADESH
TELANGANA
MADHYA PRADESH
RAJASTHAN
MAHARASHTRA
GUJARAT
name: QPRAS MARINE SERVICES LLP

idea:
CIRCLE Gaming is India’s only organised and professionally managed company who understand the nuts & bolts of the Gaming. We have highly skilled team who live Gaming every day. Having chain of Cafes in India owned & operated by company along with franchise network having 750+ Gaming PCs & Consoles.
CIRCLE Gaming gives best gaming experience to Gamers at all level, be it amateur, aspiring or professional. Having in house team of R&D at CIRCLE, we make world class innovative products from every feedback of the Gamers.
CIRCLE Gaming has become a first choice among Gamers and best place for the brands like LG, ZOTAC, to be closer to gamers to give them best of product experience.
We offer a High End PCs. Console, Comfortable Gaming Chairs & Bean Bags, Soft Drinks & Brain Food…
name: CIRCLE Gaming

idea: Our idea in a single line is Airbnb for parking. Peer to Peer parking space sharing. In congested cities like Mumbai, Delhi, Bangalore, etc. it's hard to get parking in the place where you need it and when you need it, coz there is no place on the road or no public parking nearby. But at the same time, there are housing societies or corporate buildings nearby, which have empty parking places. We want to connect these two ends of supply and demand. And we want to do this in such a way that there is absolutely no hassle and total convenience at either end, i.e. person who is parking and a person who is renting parking.
name: ParkandEarn
